system.description:
A connection to the elements and a supernatural patron has given you access to a significant amount of destructive power, and you are getting good at unleashing as much of that as possible in short windows of time. You gain the following benefits:

  • After using @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uit7l3mc64l5h8h1]{Elemental Blast}, you can use a single instance of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ulmcmf3ofmpzmgzf]{Eldritch Blast} (one attack or save) as a bonus action.
  • Half your warlock levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.qi2lr8r488mf01un]{Elemental Evolution} feature.
  • If a creature has resistance or immunity corresponding to a type of damage other than bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing that you can deal with your Elemental Blast, you gain an expertise die to Deception and Persuasion checks with that creature.
